name: bb-redux
description: connecting backbone and redux following similar syntax than react-redux

scripts.test: npm run lint && npm run test-only && npm run check
scripts.test-ci: npm run lint && npm run check && npm run coveralls
scripts.coveralls: npm run cov && cat ./coverage/lcov.info | coveralls && rm -rf ./coverage
scripts.cov: nyc --reporter=lcov --require babel-register npm run test-only && nyc report

author: Xavier Garcia Buils <xgbuils@gmail.com>
